thread.title: Home and Away lovers enjoy a romantic dinner in Sydney | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Home and Away lovers enjoy a romantic dinner in Sydney | Daily Mail Online

author: Josh Hanrahan For Daily Mail Australia
title: Home and Away lovers enjoy a romantic dinner in Sydney | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 94 shares Leaning over the small table, James said something to his girlfriend that appeared to draw a smile. Having reportedly moved in together recently, the next day the pair were spotted out and about once again this time stepping out for a spot of supermarket shopping. Table for two: The actor and actress first enjoyed a romantic dinner at an Italian restaurant in Randwick, Sydney, on Saturday night Smitten: After a few potentially tense moments, James leaned over the small table and said something to his girlfriend that appeared to draw a smile Walking hand-in-hand into the store together, the smitten couple shared a number of public displays of affection as they moved through the store. Wearing a citrus yellow leather skirt paired with a plain black t-shirt and a stylish pair of clear glasses, Isabella rocked a casual look. So too did the brunette beauty's beau, who dressed down in thongs, a maroon tee and a plain grey cap. Casual: Isabella wore a citrus yellow leather skirt paired with a plain black t-shirt and a stylish pair of clear glasses Big steps: Having reportedly moved in together recently, the pair were spotted out and about once again the day after their dinner Happy couple: The pair were pictured holding hands as they walked into the shopping centre Hand in hand: The smitten couple shared a number of public displays of affection during their shopping trip All smiles: Regularly stopping as they pushed the trolley through the supermarket, James and Isabella appeared to be enjoying themselves Walking through the aisles together, the couple picked up a variety of items such as toilet paper and fresh produce. Regularly stopping as they pushed the trolley through the supermarket, James and Isabella appeared to be enjoying themselves. At one stage James snuck up behind his girlfriend and wrapped his arms around her, seemingly much to her satisfaction. Decision time: Walking through the aisles together, the couple picked up a variety of items such as toilet paper and produce Chilled: Like his girlfriend, James also dressed down in thongs, a maroon tee and a plain grey cap Hold me in your arms! At one stage James snuck up behind his girlfriend and wrapped his arms around her Apples or oranges? It seemed the couple had a number of discussions about what they needed in their cupboard Then, with their trolley full, the pair moved through the checkout and walked out of the shop. Initially James pushed their trolley through the shopping centre, before Isabella took over the steering as they entered the carpark. Rumours first surfaced that the pair had entered a relationship in late 2016 after they were seen looking cozy on and off screen. All done: With their trolley full, the pair moved through the checkout and left the supermarket Is chivalry dead? Initially James pushed their trolley through the shopping centre, before Isabella took over the steering as they entered the carpark Share or comment on this article 94
